message: I'm excited to offer you a unique opportunity to acquire this exceptional product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident will bring you significant value. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1,200,000.
Alice, thanks for the offer, but that's quite a high price. This product would be valuable to me, but not at that cost. How about we bring it down to a more reasonable level?

I understand you think the initial price was a bit steep, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $900,000. This is a fair price considering the product's value and uniqueness. What are your thoughts?

Alice, I appreciate you coming down, but $900,000 is still more than I'm looking to spend.  To be frank, I have an alternative option available for considerably less. If you're able to come down to $700,000, I'm ready to close the deal today.

I understand you have an alternative option, but I'm confident this product is still the best choice for you. I can see you're willing to meet me halfway, so I'll meet you halfway again. I'm willing to sell it to you for $850,000. This is my final offer, and I'm not willing to go any lower.
